body_html: I can take a look if you can isolate the code that leaks in a small snippet. It should be a standalone script so I can run it myself (e.g. use random tensors as input) and, as small as possible. 528MiB is probably because you have some processes that use up CUDA memory but aren't reported by nvidia-smi. Try running killall python or killall python3 (if you don't have any other jobs/python scripts running)
